title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4202.14 - Decisions of racing judges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4202.14 - Decisions of racing judges

State Regulations

Every person participating in and every patron at a
licensed meeting shall abide by the laws and the rules and regulations, and
accept a steward or judge's decision on any and all questions to which their
authority extends, subject to the right of appeal to the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4202.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
